description: This file serves as an initializer and aggregator for the database module within the Robot Framework Test Manager project. It imports key SQLAlchemy models and database utilities, and defines the public interface for the module.

classes.name: Base
classes.description: SQLAlchemy declarative base for ORM models.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents a user within the system.

classes.name: TestScript
classes.description: Represents a test script created for testing.

classes.name: RunHistory
classes.description: Tracks execution history of test runs.

classes.name: AuditLog
classes.description: Stores audit logs for database actions.

methods.name: get_db
methods.description: Provides a database session for queries.

methods.name: create_tables
methods.description: Creates all database tables based on models.

methods.name: init_db
methods.description: Initializes the database, including setup or migrations.

calls: from .models import (Base, User, Role, UserRole, TestScript, TestCase, QueueItem, RunHistory, AuditLog, ExecutionStatus, QueueStatus, UserRoleEnum)
